name: Slap The Fly
description: You will embody a fly, a spider, a bee or a human. Your mission thus is to survive or to slap the fly !
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later Processor: Intel Core i3-6300T or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews.review_text: Positive : - Good gameplay - For indie game, very good graphics. - A lot of map + characters. Negative : - Some adjustments to do (in next update) - Solo ok (few bug), but better in multiplayer.  :)
